name: Eternal Tides
description:
After a shipwreck you find yourself in a mysterious island, cursed and unable to leave.

Attend to the tides demands and free yourself!

Made for the USP game jam - 13 anos!
Feito para o USP game jam - 13 anos!

Controls:
WASD - Move
SPACE - Wait a turn
E - Eat a fish and heal
Q - Eat a Moss Fin and regain some oxygen

---

Beautiful Firefox users: since I used Godot 4 beta, the Shared Array Buffer will not work at the current iteration (12/2022) of the browser. Please download the Desktop version or opt for a fate worse than death (use a chromium based browser).
